attributes.action: Hold the UK media accountable for the irresponsible headlines- ‘lockdown’ lifted
attributes.additional_details: Because this was irresponsible journalism that will affect 1000’s of lives
attributes.background: Newspapers such as The Sun & Daily Mail tan headlines about lockdown restrictions being lifted on Monday 11th May. These were published just prior to the bank holiday weekend of VE Day, causing the public to congregate and break all social distancing rules

rejection.details: Complaints about the press are the responsibility of the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), not the Government or Parliament.
